import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { userLogin } from "../Actions/userAction"; class Slider extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } state = { email: "", password: "", username: "vandan", error: "", userdata: "" }; handle_Userlogin = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; handle_Submit = e => { e.preventDefault(); e.target.reset(); console.log(this.state); axios .post("http://localhost:3001/user/login", { email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password }) .then(data => { if (data) { const token = data.data.token; console.log("login token", token); localStorage.setItem("auth_token", token); axios .get("http://localhost:3001/user/info", { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", auth_token: localStorage.getItem("auth_token") } }) .then(data => { if (data) { console.log(data); this.setState({ userdata: { fullname: data.data.fullname, email: this.state.email } }); } }); this.props.userLogin(this.state.userdata); } }) .catch(err => { if (err) { this.setState({ error: err.response.data }); } }); }; render() { return (

Ghar ka khaana helps improve your mood on bad days.

Easy Ordering

You can order your food at any time and can get it at your respective times to avoid wastage of your precious time.

My Account

Manage your orders - Cancellations, Order Renewals, Shares etc within seconds

How It Works?

Explore restaurants that deliver to your doorstep

Browse menus and build your order in seconds

Follow the status of your order with real-time alerts

); } } const mapStateToProps = state => { const { username, email } = state; return { username, email }; }; const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { userLogin: userdata => dispatch(userLogin(userdata)) }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Slider);
